abstract: Pfizer’s $68 billion purchase of Wyeth will close Thursday after antitrust regulators in the U.S. and Canada cleared the deal, which will make Pfizer the world’s largest drugmaker by revenue.
snippet: Pfizer’s $68 billion purchase of Wyeth will close Thursday after antitrust regulators in the U.S. and Canada cleared the deal, which will make Pfizer the world’s largest drugmaker by revenue.
lead_paragraph: Pfizer‘s $68 billion purchase of Wyeth will close Thursday after antitrust regulators in the United States and Canada cleared the deal, which will make Pfizer the world’s largest drugmaker by revenue, The Associated Press reported.

headline.main: U.S. and Canada Approve Pfizer-Wyeth Deal
